mapper.insert: insert into spboard (bno, title, writer, passwd, content) values (spboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{passwd}, #{content})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regdate, cnt from spboard order by bno desc

select bno, title, writer, regdate, cnt from (select bno, title, writer, regdate, cnt, row_number() over(order by bno desc) as rnum from spboard) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by bno desc

select bno, title, writer, regdate, cnt from (select bno, title, writer, regdate, cnt, row_number() over(order by bno desc) as rnum from spboard) where rnum between #{startPost} and #{endPost} order by bno desc

select bno, title, writer, content, regdate, cnt from (select bno, title, writer, content, regdate, cnt, row_number() over(order by bno desc) as rnum from spboard ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow} order by bno desc

select bno, title, writer, content, regdate, cnt, (select count(repno) from breply where bno = sp.bno) as repno from (select bno, title, writer, content, regdate, cnt, row_number() over(order by bno desc) as rnum from spboard ) sp where rnum between #{startPost} and #{endPost} order by bno desc
select count(bno) from spboard where bno > 0
select bno, title, writer, passwd, content, regdate, cnt from spboard where bno = #{bno}
select count(*) from spboard where bno = #{bno} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.update: update spboard set title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, passwd = #{passwd}, content = #{content}, modate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
